```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, fig.align = "center")
```

```{r}
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
pain <- fread("Bpain.csv")
```

```{r}
pain <- pain[, -c(1,6)]
```


```{r}
pain <- pain[, Morph_dummy := ifelse(Morphine > 0, 1, 0)]
pain <- pain[, Mari_dummy  := ifelse(Marijuana > 0, 1, 0)]
pain <- pain[, Prop_dummy  := ifelse(Prop >= 0.5, "1", "0")]
```


```{r}
ggplot(pain, aes(x = Morphine, y = Marijuana, color = Prop)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  theme_light()
```


```{r}
ggplot(pain, aes(x = Morphine, y = Marijuana, color = Prop_dummy)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  coord_equal() +
  ylim(0,6) +
  geom_abline(intercept = 4, slope = -4/5) +
  theme_light()
```
